answers.text:
Ben,
I'm not sure what you mean by  the term municipal appraisal study, but attached is an RFP regarding property appraisals.  If this isn't what you are meaning, please clarify and I'll see what else I can find.

author: Ben Medina
text: Can you provide me with a sample scope of work rfp for a municipal appraisal study?  I have been delegated this task to develop an RFP for such work.
title: Municipal appraisal study
